website_summaries.verdict: At about a third of the cost of some other brands, this is a good value for the price. It's also ideal for outdoor activities.
pros: Customers appreciate the convenient size, good design, and decent construction
Features hidden anti-theft pocket and water bottle holder
We love the cool mesh padding and water resistance that make it great for biking, day trips, and outdoor use
cons: A few experienced issues like seams ripping or zippers breaking with normal use

customer_reviews.title: Held up at Disney World!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bag for our vacation after a shoulder sling bag was suggested for our week-long Disney trip! It held up very well and was able to hold all of the misc items we needed in the parks. It rained at various times every day and we were able to brush the water right off with nothing seeping in! This was the only bag we carried consistently all week! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little but big bag !!
customer_reviews.text: Frankly for the price I had to get one of those. Perfect for traveling "light" while in same time having quite lot of space to carry everything you need. Also, the bag looks to be build using some good material and feels quite sturdy too and good quality. Nothing to do with one of those cheap one from China that feels like paper bags. Perfect also to carry my Mavic Pro drone along with all its accessories. And then take everything with me on my bike to a hike somewhere. I have included some pics and bag dimensions in case that could help some people to decide to buy it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Orcatrainer

customer_reviews.title: Updated-Loved the bag - maybe just defective.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this bag and used it for about 10 days before the zipper broke. I was stuck in Africa with a wide open bag. And unfortunately I am past the return date. So, if it would have held up a bit better I would have given it a 5-star rating. Loved the bag - maybe just defective. UPDATE: they replace my bag free of charge and I love it! Maybe my first was just a defective fluke. Perfect for travel without paying for a pricey brand. It’s sleek and very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Hoped It Would Be! Fits Microsoft Surface!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag as my daily commuter for work. I needed it to hold my surface pro 4 and a variety of small work items (notebook, wireless mouse, dongles). This bag meets and exceeds that need! It fits the surface pro perfectly and has room to spare. The construction material is high quality and I don't foresee it causing any issues. A great value at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made Sling Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this bag five stars, but am now changing it to one star, as the large zipper already broke after owning it for less than three weeks and using it twice. Now I know why it's inexpensive -- it's made cheaply and doesn't last normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Marx

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke in less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my three week trip to Europe. Within four days of arrival, the zipper broke and rendered it useless. I had to buy another bag while there. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sling bag on a whim for my son starting pre-k. Turns out they ‘can’t’ have sling bags, so my soul child ‘gave’ the bag to me...after I talked him into it. WELL...I love it! There are so many compartments for EVERYTHING! AND you can switch shoulders since it is made with loops on both sides. They only issue I have is that when you adjust the strap it doesn’t stay adjusted for long. But that’s easily fixed If you are crafty like me!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at a theme park and for other events when I need a lot of things on hand. I like that you can change the crossbody strap so that you can favor either shoulder. I really like the hidden pocket on the strap - you can put your cards or money there without having to worry - and the pocket on the back is good for your cell phone. It wasn't too hot to wear all day in the Florida sun, and was the perfect size. My 20-oz reusable water bottle fit in the water bottle pocket, but not all reusuables would fit there.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Clark

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in strap design...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, durable and attractive. Poor strap design. Good for a man, not a woman. Padding on the strap that goes over shoulder and collar bone is very comfortable but if you want to carry this with bag on your back, the un-padded part of the strap and place where the clasp and length adjustment lays is across your breast bone in the front making it awkward and uncomfortable. Regardless of length you give strap, it still dangles with no place for the surplus strap to go. Everything else for this bag was thought of. That's why I'm disappointed. I like the bag but am uncertain if I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S

customer_reviews.title: Good light use pack!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, doesn't seem to be the most durable. Be careful to not overload the pack and then jerk the shoulder strap because it will tear, mine has already started to tear because I over loaded it and went to grab off the floor and it pulled at the seem. With that said I am still pretty happy with it. It's about what I expected in durability, it is good for the light use (Disney, baseball games, to and from the office, ECT.)I have learned to not put more than 5lbs or so in mine and seems to handle this weight well. Love the color options and all the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: TTkk1

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for something else
customer_reviews.text: Stitching on the bag could be better. I used the bag a total of 2x's before the stitching started to separate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my purse
customer_reviews.text: I'm a writer, so writing materials go with my everywhere, as do other necessities, like my kindle or migraine medications, so a purse or totebag? Not logical, as well as being terrible for a person's shoulders and back. The backpack makes it so much easier to carry my notebooks and such, without the weight and strain of carrying it on straps on your shoulder. If, for some reason, you are carrying the backpack all day and the weight starts to bother you, you can easily switch which shoulder to carry it from. I am really, really glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Tenoko1

customer_reviews.title: Small, smelly and awkward.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than I thought. Also the bag has an awful smell to it. If you are a woman and have larger breasts this is not the bag for you. It lays very awkwardly across the boobs. It seems sturdy enough for smaller items. I’m sending this item back.
customer_reviews.author: C Vas

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for a trip. It was very comfortable slung over a shoulder. There are many compartments, including a hidden zipper area in the strap where you can hold some cash. It's relatively water resistant; rain did not get through it. The only down side is with so many compartments you might have trouble remembering where you put something :) but that's a lot better than digging around one big bag trying to come up with an item. Didn't need to use the free waterproof covering that was offered but it was a nice added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: 4Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for traveling because it is easier for me Than carrying a purse. It’s a little small but that’s on me for not looking at the details close enough. I left Sunday for my first trip with it and by the time I got to the airport one twenty minutes later one of the zippers was threatening to break. If you think I overfilled it, I didn’t. It had two tubes of berts bees chap stick. That’s it. Going to try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Easy trick for front zipper.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It has become my "man purse" as I got tired of trying to jam everything into my pockets. I and many other reviewers have had issue with the front small pocket zipper not working right. At least for me, sometimes it would zip shut and sometimes it wouldn't. I figured out that if I zip it closed with the handle of the zipper angled towards the bag, it zips closed every time. I don't know it this trick will work for everyone, but works on my bag. Minus one star due to funky zipper.
customer_reviews.author: J-Hog

customer_reviews.title: No confidence in product or Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag a few weeks ago and only had the chance to use it for 2 weeks before the cheap strap broke off. A quick glance at the clip and it's made by a pseudo looking metal. I contacted customer service 5 days ago about a replacement or replacement strap even and nothing but radio silence. This is absolutely disappointing after spending more than $30 for the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect day trip bag
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm extremely pleased with this bag and couldn't wait to go on my next hike. I singled this bag out based on the good reviews.. Thank you amazon.. customer reviews are a must read for me and are even better with pics! This bag does not disappoint in any way. I wanted a small bag with a long adjustable strap made with quality material. This fits the bill and then some. It has multiple pockets without being bulky. It's a great design and the perfect bag for a day in the woods with my pup. The teal color is also a pretty bonus.
customer_reviews.author: TealToeNailz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great storage, nice design.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for a while and it's held up. Which is impressive because I'm hard on my bags. It's got a lot of great storage. I like the strap. Zippers seem sturdy. The shell material is durable. It's easy to keep clean. Had it a while and it still looks mostly new. When you look close to can see where I snagged the inner liner with the zipper, but it all still works very well. I don't have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Buying Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and doesn't scratch or pull on clothes....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sling bag specifically to hold my camera and to keep all my dog walking paraphernalia in place for the journey. There is a spot for everything without being too overwhelming big for my body and once adjusted, it stays put. It's not the slippery parachute material, but rather, but has a nice cloth look and feel to it which makes it look more expensive than the latter. All the zippers run nicely/smoothly and for this terrific low price, it's very sturdy. I absolutely love it and will purchase again should mine ever wear out. I much prefer this to a regular backpack or a handbag.
customer_reviews.author: ~Galactic Hat~

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect Sling bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag's material and layout...comfortable straps and cushioned back with lots of pockets, and the water bottle holder is great for even a slightly large bottle. The back hidden pocket is great for keeping wallet or cell phone secure. The front pocket also can hold a cellphone and has a hidden zipper for more security. This is perfect as a day bag, hiking or vacation bag. I totally would have given this 5 stars if the interior were not black. I would love to see this offered in some other colors and patterns with a light interior, as its half the price of some other well known sling bag brands.
customer_reviews.author: Linda from Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Handsome, very good quality, and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed that this bag is as handsome and well-made as it is for so little money. I particularly like the style, which includes a slash of color for the edge of the smallest outer pocket. The inner pockets have pencil holders, smaller phone pockets, etc. without going overboard. The finish is excellent: there are no loose threads, frayed fabric, or crooked seams. It's an excellent size for my daily commute and will be on rotation with my messenger bag.
customer_reviews.author: MindKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: poor sewing job
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this bag, I brought this bag because I needed a bag to carry my daily items because I am handicapped and man those this come in handy. My wife calls it my murse but its whatever. The strap did break so I do have to figure out how to sew it back up but. All I ask is that they do better at sewing the strap maybe triple sew that way it wont break as easy. If the company could reach out that would be great or replace the bag with a bag that has better stitching would be great
customer_reviews.author: joshua perez

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: OK, I'm a big-purse person. One day I'll need my laptop, re-chargers, dongles, jump drives, and extension cords. The next time, I'll be packing some books, sunglasses, phone, and a water bottle. The next its a sketch pad, pencils, erasers, and a portable watercolor kit. The bag is not big enough for me to travel with (I use only carry-on), but for a daily purpose, it's great. It has D-rings on either side to connect the sling part. That means you can carry it across your back for hands free running for the Metro, or you can sling it over your shoulder, for a bit more protection and access. It's a great bag. I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: QuinnCreative

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Was using KAVU and needed an alternative to switch shoulders. Really like the fact that this will do that effectively! Good design of pockets and their placements. Nice color (I got blue). The only negative things I can think of is concerning the pen slips ... these aren’t tall enough for a pen to not fall out should they bag fall upside down ... and the drink holder on the outside is restricted by the cloth covering the elastic draw-string. The drawstring is plenty long for bigger bottles/tumblers but the cloth-covering won’t allow for anything larger than a 16 oz plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Peebles

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, however the strap would not stay where ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, however the strap would not stay where I adjusted it to For a "Small" bag it had lenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: MK Rice

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sling bag for day-long hikes where I needed to pack extra clothing in case of rain. It was just the right size. The multiple compartments made it easy to find things, and even when it was stuffed fairly full, it was comfortable to wear. I did find that I wanted a waist strap, so I bought a 'chest strap' online and attached it to the rings at the bottom of the bag and clipped it around my waist. I would definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Susan U.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the most uncomfortable bag I have ever carried. And the picture that shows there is a strap that wraps around the waist is false advertising. There is no strap. I am sure some people will like the bad, but for me I used it once and threw it away. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Voris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for hiking, school, regular daily activities. Its great. I can kinda fit one regular thin folder in it if needed as well as a pencil box and calculator. The hidden pocket on the strap is great for money or cards. I love having a lot of pockets and this has plenty. And the strap is padded so if i carry a lot its still comfortable. I highly recommend this one. I spent a couple weeks scanning through all the backpacks like this one and im very happy i chose this one. Oh and it really doesnt get dirty. Ive had it since this summer and havent once had to wash it, still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Looking, Comfortable Bag, but had to get ride of smell inside.
customer_reviews.text: When the bag arrived, I loved the look, the comfort, but not the awful smell inside. I aired it out in the sun for 2 days, and it was better, but the "back" pocket still smelled awful-chemical smell, so I pulled out the pocket and dipped it in baking soda water, while carefully holding up the rest of the bag. Well, what do you know? After air drying in the sun, the smell was virtually gone...so I am taking the bag on a trip to Disneyworld ! I am so happy that I was able to keep it !
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Samples

customer_reviews.title: zippersare very poor
customer_reviews.text: The bag design is great but the zipper quality is so poor they just pop open in the center off the zip allowing the bag to open up and relieve it self of your items. Depending on which shoulder you wear it on the zips either face up or down so when they are facing down and they split open out goes your things. Very sad as was happy with the product till my phone came out and hit the ground. It is only 6 months old and used all of 8 times.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Cain

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke first use
customer_reviews.text: Looked great at first, but the very first time I used it, it didn't even make it through the security check at Disney World. The back zipper broke and one very nice and honest guest at Disney picked up my wallet that had fallen out of it and let me know that it was open. It pretty much lasted all of 30 minutes from when I put it on. All the other pockets were still zipped. I stopped using it that day, so I can't tell you if the other zippers would have lasted the trip or not.
customer_reviews.author: southern belle mommy

customer_reviews.title: Solidly made
customer_reviews.text: Solidly made, good thick fabric like an LLBean item. Stitching seems good. Using it weekly to carry books (smaller than 9x12 — that big a book wouldn’t fit but just smaller would) and vars other items. When worn properly, sits middle of back with strap diagonal across chest, very comfortable and hands free. Probably many other bags just like this, but this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: D Darkman

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size travel backpack. It's lightweight, which is good for hiking, but has plenty of organization for everything I need. The main compartment is large enough to hold my DSLR camera and an extra lense, mini umbrella, travel books, etc. The backpack has lots of other zippered pockets for holding everything I need, it even has a secret compartment on the strap for concealing credit cards, etc. Have used it several times without any wear or tear.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works for any size/ age
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our ten year old to carry his coloring books and tablet and for carrying a water bottle and snack on bike rides. Feel very durable, the color is really nice and has tons of pockets. It also confirmed very well to his body when you tighten it so he doesn’t have to worry about it flopping around when he’s riding. It loosens up enough that dad and I can use it too (if we can get him to part with it). Don’t know if it’s waterproof but I sprayed it with waterproof spray just to make sure.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: I dont like backpacks. But everytime i travel or do something ...
customer_reviews.text: I dont like backpacks. But everytime i travel or do something sporty i feel the need for a backpack.. so i bought this on a whimp while vacationing.. it was on a lightning deal too so i thiught why not. I. Love. It. Wore it to a fun run event today. While i did not take it running, i did use it for the rest of the day. I had a huge battery pack, thick wallet (thick with coins i might add), 2 bottles of water, and other things. Not only that they fit, it didnt feel like it's making my shoulder tired too. Too bad it doesnt come in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: R. Suwarna

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size to carry keys, wallet, small water bottle, a long sleeve shirt, a hat, scarf, and a small notebook or an ipad. It's terribly uncomfortable though. I switched the strap back and forth all day because after about 30 min it would hurt my neck and shoulder. I'm a professional landscaper, I lift and carry heavy stuff all day but this bag hurt more than a day's work. The strap in the front also doesn't stay put and slips put easily after you've tightened it to your desired length. You're walking along and suddenly, the bag slips down.
customer_reviews.author: MoeMoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag! My picky 12 yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son got a Nintendo Switch for Christmas. He wanted a bag to hold the system, games, carrying case, controllers, etc. This bag is the perfect size for all his stuff. He also has extra room to fit his chromebook. He loves all the different pockets and that he can switch which side he carries it on. He just turned 12 and the bag fits well with the strap adjusted to the tightest position. He now wants another bag to replace the drawstring bag he uses in school (full backpacks aren't allowed).
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Good bag Great service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cross body backpack and loved it so much that I purchased another one for my daughter. Unfortunately, the second bag did not have an inside pocket inside the main compartment. I wrote to Outdoor Master explaining my disappointment. The company responded back within 24 hrs, apologized and ask me to send a picture of the bag without the pocket. I did. Within days I received a new sling bag (with pocket) and I was told to keep the second bag free of charge. I would recommend this bag to anyone looking for versatility and good craftsmanship. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. This bag works well over one shoulder or cross body. I love that it has various sized pockets to keep small things from getting lost. The large pocket easily fits my iPad and other bulky items. The outside pocket fits a drink or water bottle securely without fear of it falling out. If you are looking for something smaller than a backpack and easy to carry, this is what you want. Choose your favorite color, I got the teal and it is the same as shown in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sling Bag for Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sling bag to replace another sling bag that I've used for years (that sling bag is still holding up, but the zippers are not). This OutdoorMaster Sling Bag is slightly bigger than my old one, has a few more pockets (including a "security" pocket along the back), and a water bottle holder (for small water bottles). Needless to say, I can put more stuff in the new bag compared to the old one. I also like that you can switch to left or right shoulder if you wanted to. Time will tell if this will be a durable bag. But I didn't have to break the bank for it either :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pocket for water bottle is to small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for the following reasons: 1) Had a side pocket for water bottle (my current old bag doesn't have one). 2) Compact size. 3) Good looking. 4) Good reviews. I returned the bag upon arrival. The reason was that I was not able to fit my 82 mm diameter water bottle into the outside special pocket. The pocket was way to small. By the way: the bag on the picture, on Amazon, looks nice and smooth. However, the one I got was so wrinkled it looked like it survived fight with a pit bull.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Far more space than expected
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a big enough main pocket to fit a text book, a small notebook, headphones with case, a tube of sunscreen, and various other things. The anti-theft pocket is nice for a wallet or chequebook. I don’t know about the durability as I just got the bag but it looks like it will be perfect for my life as a researcher and student. Oh, it also has a nice big pocket for a water bottle. Gotta keep hydrated. After a year of use the zipper to one of the main compartments cane off. I was able to get it back on but I’m worried since I use this bag everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: C. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this. You need it in your life. Especially if you do short outdoor excursions. You cannot beat it for the price. I can put my: Phone Keys Earphones Sanitary bags for my dog FOUR LARGE water bottles Extra pair of shoes Wallet Water bowl for my dog And it still has room. Not to mention the different was you can maneuver the clasps. This thing is heaven sent. Thank you for the quality you and thought you put into your products.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Get this now!! :)
customer_reviews.text: I love this sling. It has become my outing bag, taking place of my purse. I've taken it on trips through the airport and amusement park. It's a great bag! It carries all the necessities. I love that I don't have to take it off if I need something from it, I can just slide it around and get whatever item I need. I love the compartment in the front of the strap. I keep cash and credit cards in it for easy access and security. It is really awesome. If you like sling bags, you'll love this one. The quality is also very good. No issues with any of it yet.
customer_reviews.author: JNoel

customer_reviews.title: Smell  musty
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they arrived just in time for my trip with my daughter. They both smell incredibly musty as if they have been stored in a musty attic. One smells so bad that even the inside smells horrible. I’m too afraid to place anything on the bag for fear of it smelling. I tried to wash them on a delicate cycle and they still smell. I’m always horrible about returning items but may need to figure out how to do that because these are just terrible. Very disappointed. The design and style is great....just can’t use them due to a terrible musty odor. They were fresh out of the plastic too.
customer_reviews.author: melissadg

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter told me to buy one of these Sling bags to use as my purse as mine was starting to hurt my shoulders. Loved the color I ordered! There is quite a bit of room in this bag. It’s well made but is a little large for me to use everyday but works beautifully for trips to Busch Gardens for the day or any outing where I need a little more with me than average. Price was great and I would buy it again. Would love to have one like it in a smaller version.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda A. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly!!!!!!!!!  Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought another bag, and it was just a little too small. This one is perfect!! I can actually put my kindle or ipad in this one and not have to mess around with the other items to get it to zip. This has enough compartments for me to separate everything, but still have enough room to carry the items I need. I don't have to fight it to make everything fit!! Love it!! I received it quickly, too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: This bag was awesome for the first 2 weeks I used it
customer_reviews.text: This bag was awesome for the first 2 weeks I used it. Now the stitching is coming apart in 3 places! I didn't use it right after I bought it so I am unable to return it! I plan to try to contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: lulu77

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, you could fit a surface pro 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, you could fit a surface pro 4 with a UAG case,however that was pretty much it lol .The cell phone pocket seem like it was ment for a flip phone or small bar size. My S8 couldn't not fit inside it. Also the zippers seem like they were going against each other.lol Let me explain . If you have the strap on one side where the strap pocket is up facing , the pockets from the backpack were on the opposite side. ( so you could not swing the around and open) and via versa .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Clearly an above average pack
customer_reviews.text: I want does what I need it to do. A bit heavier than most. The top of the water bottle holder is not elasticized; 2.5" diameter. Fairly small bottle. My biggest issue is the manufacturer's claim that this pack can carry a 12.5" laptop. No way! I have a book that is 10" x 10". It barely fits that largest compartment. A few 11.5" laptops I saw on Amazon that might fit based on their stated folded dimensions, but no 12.5's. Overall, I'd likely buy it again, but the seller should be more transparent with it's sale pitch.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but carries less than expected and all items must be flat lying.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality of fabric, zippers, and color. Has a smaller volume than expected. I was not able to carry my hydroflask and extra eyeglasses case comfortably in this pack due to it's lack of depth. Trying to do so made the pack stick out uncomfortably. If you're someone carrying flat lying objects in your commute this item may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday-bag. I'm not a purse kinda girl. This is so cute and not bulky. I even bought one for my 19 year old son. I have it in black, it has held up and kept color after several washing (I hang it up to dry). I am actually fixing to order one in gray. People have made their remarks and giggles bc I carry a "backpack" instead of a purse. But guess what... I know where everything is, it's very organized and I don't have to dig in the bottom of a bag and hope to find what I need, i go straight to it.
customer_reviews.author: RubyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this in the front, made possible by changing the strap at the bottom from one loop to another. That meant I could grab a water bottle and whatever else without having to take the bag off before accessing it, as I'd have to with a backpack. Anyone who knows they'll need different items as you go through a hectic day of traveling/touring will appreciate this. The constant stopping to disengage the backpack made me crazy on previous trips. There's a wide, padded strap that is adjustable. Very comfortable. The kangaroo pouch-like aspect is worth the convenience and security for anyone out on an all-day adventure.
customer_reviews.author: writergrl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry with me everywhere and store everything I ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a purse replacement on a recent cruise. Easy to carry with me everywhere and store everything I needed. A tiny bit smaller than I was expecting, but I had no issue cramming my needed items into the bag. This was my first every crossbody bag so I definitely wasn't used to the one sided zipper for everything and so twisting it around my body to get the zipper on the right side was annoying, but that was a personal issue, not a quality issue. Lovely color, lovely product. My cruise would not have been as manageable without it.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the pockets. I have to go to doctor appointments all the time for myself and other people so waiting, being bored, being patient is a big deal. This handy bag can hold medium size books, a Nintendo DS, my sunglasses, my medications, and much more and I can be sure they'll be safe in the rain (or if someone accidentally dumps a mocha latte on it.) It's also handy for airport security and the sling style is comfy to boot. Love it and would definitely buy it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Elliot Scrambles

customer_reviews.title: Cool hidden zippers!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super cool. This is a very good backpack to have if you want your items to be protected by thieves. There are so many random compartments and zippers that I found a new zipper a week after buying it! There are 5 openings to parts of the bag in total. The most craziest being the strap. Yest there is a pocket on the strap!! So for that spot I put my pocket knife in it so if someones like give me that bag I just act like I'm pulling it off and open the zipper at the same time and he wont know what I'm doing before its too late!
customer_reviews.author: Modern Assassin

customer_reviews.title: Great for diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to use as a diaper bag/ purse. I finally realized I didn't need to pack 90% of the baby stuff I had and just needed something easier to carry that wasn't huge. I can easily fit a changing pad, 4 or so diapers, travel wipes case, a couple changes of clothes, burp cloth, pacifier, couple bottles, and my stuff which is wallet, keys, phone, headphones and a few misc things usually. I wish that it was maybe a little bigger, and the adjustable strap was a little bigger but overall I love it and it does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kreindel

customer_reviews.title: It was too large so we sent it back.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, but I was disappointed in the color. I thought it would be bright crimson, but it was woven with red threads going one way and black threads the other - the color was not bright. It was well made and it you wanted a larger bag - like a backpack with one strap - this would be a good choice, I think I would order the black, however , because I didn't care for the crimson one. We found a small one on Amazon and are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S. Carling

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD sling bag
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: Received rain pouch from vender as offered, so I reinstated my 5 Star rating as now the bag will be usable on rainy days! Thank you Outdoor Master! The bag is well designed and well made. Expect it will be durable. Although the seller graciously offers a free 'rain cover', I do wish they would offer a model constructed with a waterproof material. I for one works definitely purchase that version. Still a great sling bag ...
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN EXPECTED FOR HIKING
customer_reviews.text: We hiked a moderate trail for about 4 hours - 6 miles - hot day. Carried water, snacks, and other necessities. I'm 66 years old and I don't usually carry anything on our hikes - my husband does. I was prepared to hand it off to him if I got tired of carrying it, but when we got back for the day I realized I didn't even notice it most of the time....only when I needed something out of it...and it's really easy to swing it around to open it up without taking it off. Great pack.
customer_reviews.author: Thisnthat

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: For the $20 I paid for this, I was delighted. It feels well made, the shoulder padding is substantial, especially considering it will never bear that much weight. The zippers feel like they are of a good quality. There are pockets everywhere. for such a small bag, it's friggen covered in pockets. Small medium, and large where you would expect them. There's a secret pocket on the back side, and yet another one cleverly concealed in the shoulder strap. not huge, but it's enough to stash paper money in. For $20 bucks? I'm just blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Foote

customer_reviews.title: Do not wet bag.
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because it had served me very well and been very convenient. But I was partying, and vomited inside it as to not puke in someone’s car... very leaky. Doesn’t contain liquid well when I’m working and my drunk condensates either. DEFINITELY not waterproof, but otherwise, great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the order quick and am extremely pleased with it. Very good quality material. Love all the different compartments and adjustable strap. I've used it hiking, to take water and snacks to kids ball games, and as a gym bag. I like it so much I now have two. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Although I have yet to put this bag to use, it is all set and ready to go. It’s surprisingly roomy and had more features than I had originally thought. The bag appears to be water resistant, the strap has 2 clasps not 1, and the strap is not just padded but adjustable! The only thing I wish I would have done was waited to purchase my water bottle. It will hold a skinny water bottle but not one that is above 20 oz. it will however hold disposal water bottles. I am loving this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: great size but broke within 5 days
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for a 10 day trip to Peru. It is a great size, easy to use and the hidden security section works great for a passport and some cash. Sadly within 5 days the decorate silver circle on the front of the bag broke off leaving the black piece that it holds onto the bag flapping around for the rest of the trip. The bag would be a great buy if it didn't fall apart so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect! I needed it for a biking trip and it wored great. I use an RTIC 64oz sport bottle for my water and it fit in there, along with my phone, wallet, keys, some snacks, chapstick..and I still had room! It is the perfect size. The ability to carry it either shoulder is a plus! I used it both ways, one on the way to my destination and then switch it to the other on my way back. The strap is wide enough and has good padding that it does not hurt. The teal color is maybe a little bit darker than the picture, but that could be my screen. I totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bag!! I've bought two, use as my purse
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bag... Not because there is anything wrong with the first one, but because I wanted another color 😁. This is the perfect mom bag... Plenty of pockets, slings over your shoulder so that your little one can't grab it, and it leaves you hands free. My Galaxy tab S, which is a 10.5 inch tablet, just fits into the holder in the biggest pocket. I beat the heck out of my green one and it still looks brand new. I recommend this to anyone looking for a stylish, durable bag that's also easy on the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: JBoydTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love this bad
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sling bag that would be small and light enough for daily use. I'm very happy with this bag. I've gotten a replacement since the elastic on bottle holder failed and broke and customer service immediately sent out a new one while I waited for it to arrive. New bag is perfect and haven't had issues with it on daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Kim

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, affordable, and lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure of the durability, as I have not had the bag very long. The price was reasonable, so I being unable to buy another Quechua bag, I thought I would try this one. Its dimensions mirror the one made by Quechua that I have owned since 2014 and have thoroughly enjoyed. Though its capacity is large, it is very lightweight and carries easily across the body. It enables one to carry it across the front of the body and simultaneously carry a backpack as a carry-on. I am hoping this bag will last as long as my Quechua did. If so, I will highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nandu

customer_reviews.title: BEST BAG EVER
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this bag! It’s so versatile and the strap can be adjusted so it can be worn across either shoulder. So much storage and lots of hidden pockets. We switched from using a backpack as a “kid bag” to this bag and there Is plenty of room for all the snacks, Epi pens, sunscreen, wallets etc
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kopydlowski

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight n not too big, nor too small.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because a backpack is too big n hot to carry around all the time, and I have too much stuff to stuff my pants pockets with, this “half pack” works perfect. I call it that cause that’s about what it is, half a backpack. Well made and lightweight the zippers are good, that’s one drawback of things like these the zippers are always crap but not on this one, lots of different pockets on it too. I recommend this if you don’t have a lot of stuff to carry around but too much for just your pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dornan

customer_reviews.title: Great compact travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: Took a recent trip to Europe. This bag had a low profile but a surprising amount of storage. The carry straps had multiple clips on which to attach it so that you can carry the bag on your back or across your chest. The strap itself had a convenient little zipper pocket for keys and other quick access items. There were multiple pockets in which to store items which enabled be to separate things based upon need and frequency of access. I was able to put a full sized folder in here at one point as well as a water bottle in a separate side pocket.
customer_reviews.author: TarukaS

customer_reviews.title: Compartments for Everything- awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag!! It has compartments and room for everything! It fits great on your back or around the front. I love that you can switch it to wear it across either shoulder. I can’t wait to take it to Universal!
customer_reviews.author: LondonDreaming

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sling Bag
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this short and sweet because others have written fantastic in depth reviews for this bag. I think this is an awesome bag because there are tons of pockets -- I especially like the discreet pocket which is nicely concealed when wearing the bag and a great place for me to place my keys when I am walking around the city. My main objectives when looking for an everyday bag were to find one with an exterior water bottle pocket, thoughtful storage inside of the bag and a sturdiness which would be hold up to everyday usage. This sling bag backpack has exceeded my expectations because it's ideal for me and it also comfortably fits my 11" Chrome book.
customer_reviews.author: Wilderpeople

customer_reviews.title: Very good carry on bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sling bag for a flight I was going on. It would act as my carry on bag to hold passport, kindle, phone, notebook, snacks, etc. I am very happy with the quality of the bag and its capacity. I like the location of the zippered pockets. I would not say it is pick-pocket-proof, but I think it would be difficult to access some of the pockets without alerting the owner. The water bottle pocket was a feature I wanted in this, and it is spacious and with the top cord your bottle stays very secured in its pocket. It easily holds a 16 oz water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: petewit67

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag For Travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use for a 4th of July trip to New York and a July trip to Cancun. It held plenty - even an extra pair of shoes - but for my personal comforts, it ran a little big even with the strap tightened. (For comparison purposes, I'm 5'6".) My husband carried it in Mexico and he absolutely loves it. Perfectly sized for him at 5'10" and held everything he needed for a flight, including a couple of books.
customer_reviews.author: jnazmom474

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag but hard to fit laptops
customer_reviews.text: This bag gets everything right that most others don't. Great if you like minimal daily carry. My only complaint is that it will not fit my 2-3 year old old 13 inch laptop (with big bezels) and latest gen 13 inch mbp barely fits. So it needs to be a little bigger or a square shaped instead of tear dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: Good little bag
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable on a strenuous hike, has ample space for carrying your stuff. My only complaints are the zipper on the small outer pocket does not work well, and the bag is heavier than I expected, but it's so sturdy that I will definitely continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlottean

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband. He needs something for all of his little things to take to work. The bag has nice material and good zippers. I like the size (not tiny but not big) and a good amount of compartments. My only disappointment was the hardware. I'm not sure what it would cost to upgrade the hardware but if it was reasonable I'd spend the extra $ for nicer hardware. This hardware feels and looks cheap, light plastic(y) and almost like the metal color is painted on? The plastic piece that adjusts the strap is also very small. Hopefully it holds up well and he uses it. Otherwise it's a nice bag for the price !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sling Bag
customer_reviews.text: This sling bag is cool and fun to use when I am on the go. I like the ability to wear it over my shoulder and easily pull it toward the front to access contents. A backpack doesn't function like this one. I love all my backpacks, but this one is slightly different. Wish it was a bit softer and larger. Can only carry a few items. Love the inside pockets. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leala Jew

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive bag with decent storage.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for day trips. Love the extra compartment that is on the back of the bag because it fits my wallet and phone securely but away from the main compartments. The one thing I really don't like about the bag is the water bottle holder only holds a small 20oz bottle of water. Other than that, my wife and I both love it, she even hung up her Coach purse for this thing.
customer_reviews.author: defunct

customer_reviews.title: Space-saving organization in an easy to carry bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to replace another that was more of a backpack style. The other bag didn't hold up well and the lining ripped after maybe 4 months' use. This bag is spacious but not "clunky," and it's definitely sturdy. It has several compartments which makes it easy to separate items so I can find them quickly. I like its lines and the way it sits on the back of my shoulder. I definitely would purchase this bag again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and the perfect size for day trips
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great. Took it on our trip to Europe. It has lots of neat spots to hold anything and everything from small to big! Even with me packing everything under the sun in it, it held up fantastic. The strap was well padded to ease the weight. It's well made - the zippers work smoothly and the buckle was used repeatedly. I've had it for 6 months now and there is still no sign of wear or tear. What I really like about it is that you can easily switch the strap so you can wear it across either shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Generic Earthling

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a Disney trip. I purchased a Kavu bag at the same time and ended up returning the Kavu bag. This bag is a bit bigger with more compartments for organizing. The shoulder straps can be swapped so you can change arms and the metal clips are very durable. I believe this bag will hold up a while. I have been using it as my everyday bag since our Disney trip first week in April. Would be nice if it came in more patterns like Kavu, but this one worked for my husband also when I was tired of carrying everyone's things.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This Sling Bag looks big, but it's alot smaller in person & it's pockets are even smaller!
customer_reviews.text: It's too small to hold anything, unless you use it to hold LOTS of small stuff. Pay attention to the measurements, its a really small bag. The pockets on the outside of the bag looks like they could a bunch of stuff, but once you zip them open, most of the pockets abruptly end. This bag couldn't even hold a text book. Do yourself a favor go with a Sling Bag like this one:  You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jackaroe311

customer_reviews.title: GREAT all around bag!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this bag so I have t had a chance to use it yet but it is loaded ready to go. Great bag: size, material, construction and zippers. Well designed pocket sizes and dimensions. I especially like that the sling strap can be changed to either side. Phone pocket on strap in front is small. My regular sized iPhone 6 does not fit but that doesn’t bother me since I like the 8nternal phone pocket just fine. Thanks for a good looking, functional bag. I will look for other OutDoor Master products based on my impression of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska the 49th State

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, loved this bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for vacation because I wanted to be hands free in the airports. This bag was perfect. It's not huge, but it fit my purse, diapers, wipes, snacks and more! I love that there is a tiny pocket on the strap for small things (hair ties, money) and a pocket that sits against your back that fits a phone, credit cards and things you want to keep closer to you. It's become my daily diaper bag. I love being hands free while chasing after my 2 year old. Highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: arp2803

customer_reviews.title: Great For Travels
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag for my travels to Mexico and this bag more than did the job on my daily excursions. Just the right size to carry an iPad, headphones, extra battery pack, passport, water, snacks, sun glasses, reading glasses and room for more without being oversized like a backpack. You can't go wrong with bag's size and feature pockets. Solid construction and zippers. Sling is easily released, adjustable and can be used to the left or right. Great bag and would recommend for travels - dump your backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Callejero

customer_reviews.title: Small but well made
customer_reviews.text: Im returning this bag because it is much smaller then i had expected. I was trying to fit my bible and travel guide for ireland in it and both books wouldnt even fit. This might be a nice option if your planning on just using it like a purse to carry small item. I wouldnt recommend it as a hiking day bag because its very small. I have a raincoat, 2 books and some paperwork that I need to put in it and it wouldnt all fit. Plus side it seems very well made. The fabric was extremely stiff and the shape looked ok when wearing it on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I think I have had this for over two years now. It has seen repeated, and heavy use in that time. By all rights, it should be in pieces. But nay- this must be forged from the souls of the wicked, because after all the abuse it has endured, only one zipper ‘tab’ has come off- not the zipper, just the little dangly bit. So amaze. Many wowwe. Good times
customer_reviews.author: Tengu

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to take on trip to Europe. Was so pleased with my decision to buy this! I had first purchased the Columbia Atom backpack. Once I received, I quickly realized that it did not have near the room I needed for all of my necessities. i love the adjustable straps. You can decide how close you want it to you. Also, can wear either on the back or front. After I returned, I washed in washing machine. Still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: jaboodles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the hospital!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for work and it is perfect! I work in the hospital doing trauma and acute care surgery and am “on the run” all day and require to have a lot of things on me. Since covid hit, I don’t want to wear a jacket and only hospital scrubs so this sling bag has been perfect! Great size to fit everything needed. Light weight and very comfortable! Multiple people on our team ended up purchasing the same bag!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany M Kerwood

customer_reviews.title: Almost not quite.
customer_reviews.text: So I love the size. The water bottle pocket will only hold a store water bottle - not a regular sized reusable. I had to pin the adjustment to wear I wanted it because it constantly slid. It will not stay on my shoulder unless it’s crossbody. Color is as pictured. It’s a nice size with lots of pockets but I bought it to have an outside water bottle and I still don’t have that.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several similar ones here on Amazon and decided to try this one. LOVE it! Adjustable straps are comfy, I particularly wanted the water bottle holder, so that was great, and all the pockets are very useful (with organizers in two of them). Won't fit my Lenovo laptop, but would probably fit a smaller iPad. That's not what I bought it for, though. I bought it for a purse substitute / dog supplies carrier / travel bag for hiking trails and walking around town. Looks very nice and the material is sturdy, but soft. I got the teal one. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: LRC5555

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Lighr
customer_reviews.text: I have a terrible habit of misplacing my wallet. phone and car keys. I was looking for a light bag that could carry the aforementioned articles and prevent me from searching the house looking for them. This sling back has enough space to carry my items and it has truly simplified my life by allowing me to keep all the essential things I take with me in one place. I even use it when I go mountain biking.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Marshi

customer_reviews.title: Main Zipper Broke After 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: I originally was a big fan of it but after the zipper broke off after only having it for about 6 months, I realized it wasn't a terribly well made product. Granted, it was only a $20 backpack, so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Other User

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been having this a long time and still looks new! Im a field nurse which means it gets thrown all over and has seen all of the elements so yes it bery sturdy. Pockets are convenient for separating supplies and side pocket for water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Cue

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoulder pack and Fanny pack
customer_reviews.text: I love this little shoulder pack fanny pack combo It's got many different pockets of different sizes easy access so you can get things easily sturdy and it comes in different colors I love this blue goes with my blue eyes
customer_reviews.author: Big Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, durable, but...
customer_reviews.text: While this bag has various pockets in the inside, it was difficult to see. The interior is black so the pockets do not stand out. I did not realize there where so many because of the darkness. It would have been much nicer to have a lighter fabric on the interior. I had to put strips of bright duct tape on the pockets so I could find/see them. Otherwise, it is a very nice bag for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OutdoorMaster Sling Bag - Crossbody Shoulder Chest Urben/Outdoor/Travel Backpack for Women & Men
feature_bullets: COMPACT YET SPACIOUS SLING BAG FOR MEN & WOMEN - Versatile backpack with room for all your essentials - perfect for urben, travel and outdoor and as carry on luggage.
LIGHTWEIGHT CROSSBODY DESIGN - Made of a lightweight, STURDY MATERIAL. Room for camera, tablet or a small laptop computer (up to 12").
HIDDEN ANTI-THEFT POCKET & WATER BOTTLE HOLDER - Equipped with several smart pockets, such as HIDDEN ANTI-THEFT POCKET & external water bottle holder.
REVERSIBLE SHOULDER STRAP DIRECTION - The perfect pack for BOTH LEFTIES & RIGHTIES with reversible softly padded shoulder strap. Can be worn as chest, shoulder & crossboday sling bag.
WHAT YOU GET: OutdoorMaster Sling Bag, OutdoorMaster's 6 months 100% satisfaction guarantee warranty and friendly customer service.
